room_title: Escape room "20,000 Leagues" by 5 Wits in Boston
review: I visit my nephew twice year he wanted to come here he did the 20,000 leagues under the sea and have a blast this time he wanted to do spy games are host with Shannon she was excellent enthusiastic and fun,she made it all worthwhile. Where were these places when we were younger!

room_title: Escape room "20,000 Leagues" by 5 Wits in Boston
review: We had my son's 8th birthday party there, it was great! Ellen was our guide, and she was excellent with the the kiddos. We did 2000 Leagues under the sea, which did require the kids to think alot. I would highly recommend, but i do not think parents should NOT have to pay when going in the tour with their kids who may be nervous; Especially since we were paying hundreds of dollars. With that, i would go again and loved the experience!

room_title: Escape room "20,000 Leagues" by 5 Wits in Boston
review: Just left 5 WITS in Foxboro, Ma. We ended up doing both shows back to back. Ellen was our guide for both and she was great!! We had two adults and two kids (11 & 13). Ellen was great at keeping the group entertained and got everyone to participate! So much fun! We will come back again! Thank's !

room_title: Escape room "20,000 Leagues" by 5 Wits in Boston
review: Great option to have a unique entertainment experience in family friendly environment. Do not dress up! You will have a chance to solve life size puzzles!

room_title: Escape room "20,000 Leagues" by 5 Wits in Boston
review: This place is soooo much fun! We had a great time, thank you!!

room_title: Escape room "20,000 Leagues" by 5 Wits in Boston
review: Wonderful experience with a wonderful tour guide! Kids had a blast and so did I!

room_title: Escape room "20,000 Leagues" by 5 Wits in Boston
review: Great place for any age! We had a blast when we went. I had no idea what to expect there and it was alot of fun!
